name: Andhra Pradesh
description: Southern coastal state of India, known for its beautiful beaches, rich heritage, and vibrant culture. Famous for Tirupati temple and rich Hindu culture.
spiritualSignificance: Famous for Tirupati temple and rich Hindu culture

name: Arunachal Pradesh
description: Northeastern mountainous state with pristine landscapes and diverse tribal cultures. Known for Tawang Monastery and Buddhist heritage.
spiritualSignificance: Known for Tawang Monastery and Buddhist heritage

name: Assam
description: Tea-growing state in northeast India with lush greenery and rich biodiversity. Kamakhya temple and Majuli river island are iconic.
spiritualSignificance: Kamakhya temple and Majuli river island

name: Bihar
description: Northern plains state of India with ancient history and spiritual significance. Home to Nalanda University, Bodh Gaya, and Mahabodhi Temple.
spiritualSignificance: Nalanda University, Bodh Gaya, Mahabodhi Temple

name: Chhattisgarh
description: Central Indian state with forests and rivers. Famous for Chitrakoot Falls and ancient temples.
spiritualSignificance: Famous for Chitrakoot Falls and ancient temples

name: Goa
description: Small coastal state in western India known for its beaches, nightlife, and Portuguese heritage. Churches, temples, and spiritual festivals.
spiritualSignificance: Known for churches, temples, and spiritual festivals

name: Gujarat
description: Western state of India with vibrant culture and rich heritage. Dwarka, Somnath temple, and rich Vedic heritage.
spiritualSignificance: Dwarka, Somnath temple, rich Vedic heritage

name: Haryana
description: Northern state surrounding Delhi with agricultural landscapes and historical significance. Kurukshetra, sacred land of Mahabharata.
spiritualSignificance: Kurukshetra, sacred land of Mahabharata

name: Himachal Pradesh
description: Himalayan state in north India with breathtaking mountain views and cool climate. Temples in Kullu, Manali, and sacred mountains.
spiritualSignificance: Temples in Kullu, Manali, sacred mountains

name: Jharkhand
description: Eastern state with forests and tribal heritage. Baidyanath Dham temple and spiritual retreats.
spiritualSignificance: Baidyanath Dham temple, spiritual retreats

name: Karnataka
description: Southern state with rich culture and heritage. Mysore Palace, Hampi temples, and sacred rivers.
spiritualSignificance: Mysore Palace, Hampi temples, sacred rivers

name: Kerala
description: Southern coastal state known as God's Own Country. Sabarimala, backwaters, and ancient temples.
spiritualSignificance: Sabarimala, backwaters, ancient temples

name: Madhya Pradesh
description: Central Indian state with historical monuments and wildlife. Khajuraho temples, Omkareshwar, and spiritual heritage.
spiritualSignificance: Khajuraho temples, Omkareshwar, spiritual heritage

name: Maharashtra
description: Western state of India with bustling cities and historic sites. Shirdi, Trimbakeshwar, and Bhimashankar temples.
spiritualSignificance: Shirdi, Trimbakeshwar, Bhimashankar temples

name: Manipur
description: Northeast India state with pristine lakes and unique culture. Sacred forests and local temples.
spiritualSignificance: Sacred forests and local temples

name: Meghalaya
description: Northeastern hill state known as the abode of clouds. Sacred groves and spiritual landscapes.
spiritualSignificance: Sacred groves and spiritual landscapes

name: Mizoram
description: Northeastern hilly state with scenic beauty. Tribal spiritual heritage and natural sacred sites.
spiritualSignificance: Tribal spiritual heritage and natural sacred sites

name: Nagaland
description: Northeast India with hills and tribal culture. Local sacred sites and tribal religious practices.
spiritualSignificance: Local sacred sites and tribal religious practices

name: Odisha
description: Eastern coastal state with rich cultural heritage. Jagannath Puri, Konark Sun Temple, and holy rivers.
spiritualSignificance: Jagannath Puri, Konark Sun Temple, holy rivers

name: Punjab
description: Northern state of India with fertile plains and vibrant culture. Golden Temple and Sikh spiritual center.
spiritualSignificance: Golden Temple, Sikh spiritual center

name: Rajasthan
description: Western desert state with royal palaces and forts. Temples in Jaipur, Pushkar, and sacred forts.
spiritualSignificance: Temples in Jaipur, Pushkar, sacred forts

name: Sikkim
description: Northeast Himalayan state with stunning mountain views. Rumtek Monastery, sacred mountains and lakes.
spiritualSignificance: Rumtek Monastery, sacred mountains and lakes

name: Tamil Nadu
description: Southern coastal state with ancient Dravidian architecture. Meenakshi Temple, Rameswaram, and sacred pilgrimage sites.
spiritualSignificance: Meenakshi Temple, Rameswaram, sacred pilgrimage sites

name: Telangana
description: Southern state in India with modern cities and heritage. Bhadrachalam temple and rich spiritual traditions.
spiritualSignificance: Bhadrachalam temple, rich spiritual traditions

name: Tripura
description: Northeast India state with royal palaces and temples. Ancient temples and sacred groves.
spiritualSignificance: Ancient temples and sacred groves

name: Uttar Pradesh
description: Northern plains state with rich history and spiritual significance. Kashi, Varanasi ghats, and Ayodhya spiritual sites.
spiritualSignificance: Kashi, Varanasi ghats, Ayodhya spiritual sites

name: Uttarakhand
description: Northern Himalayan state known as Dev Bhoomi. Haridwar, Rishikesh, and Char Dham temples.
spiritualSignificance: Haridwar, Rishikesh, Char Dham temples

name: West Bengal
description: Eastern state of India with rich cultural heritage. Kalighat temple, Dakshineswar, and spiritual rivers.
spiritualSignificance: Kalighat temple, Dakshineswar, spiritual rivers
